title: Trufora, a Science-Based, Anti-Aging Skincare Line that Addresses Visible Signs of Skin Aging, Announces Today Their Commitment to Breast Cancer Research
text:
Skincare line partners with Bright Pink to help raise awareness of environmental factors linked to breast cancer
Austin, Texas (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
Trufora, a science-based, anti-aging skincare line that addresses visible signs of skin aging, announces today their commitment to breast cancer research through a partnership with Bright Pink.
“Every year, more than 200,000 women in the U.S. are diagnosed with breast cancer. We believe that awareness about prevention and early detection of breast cancer is just as important as ongoing research to support finding a cure,” said Sara Sweeney, CEO of Truth Aesthetics, maker of Trufora. “We are excited to help this important cause by donating 5% of all profits from Trufora.com in October to Bright Pink, a non-profit organization with a mission to save women’s lives from breast and ovarian cancer by empowering them to live proactively at a young age.”
Trufora is taking the lead in raising awareness of environmental risk factors that can be associated with breast cancer. As a company whose principles are based on the importance of only containing “good ingredients,” Trufora is free from chemicals that are commonly known to disrupt hormones in the body. Trufora products not only make you feel good on the outside, but are also products that you can feel good about using.
“We are so honored to partner with Bright Pink and help increase awareness of their organization and donate to those in need during Breast Cancer Awareness month,” said Sweeney. “As a woman and a mother to two young girls, I am truly devoted to creating products that are not harmful and made with only the best possible ingredients.”
Trufora will be donating 5% of all profits on any purchase made on trufora.com to Bright Pink through the month of October. Visit http://www.trufora.com to learn more about products, ingredients and our partnership with Bright Pink.
